mapper.sql: cc.id, cc.project_id, cc.name, cc.type, cc.batch, cc.thirdparty_shop_id, cc.sysgen_flag, cc.portrait, cc.num, cc.amount, cc.subtract_amount, cc.support_refund_flag, cc.info, cc.create_time, cc.last_update, cc.delete_flag, cc.delete_time
mapper.select:
SELECT , SUM(launch_num) AS sum_launch_num, cts.name AS thirdparty_shop_name, CASE WHEN !ISNULL(SUM(ccl.launch_num)) THEN cc.num - SUM(ccl.launch_num) WHEN ISNULL(SUM(ccl.launch_num)) THEN cc.num END AS available_num FROM ( SELECT * FROM card_coupon cc
ORDER BY cc.create_time DESC
) cc LEFT JOIN card_coupon_launch ccl ON cc.id = ccl.coupon_id and ccl.delete_flag = 0 and ccl.confirm_flag = 1 AND ccl.review_status = 1 LEFT JOIN card_third_party_shop cts ON cts.id = cc.thirdparty_shop_id AND cts.delete_flag = 0
GROUP BY cc.id ORDER BY cc.create_time DESC

SELECT , ccss.store_id AS ccss_store_id, ccss.ratio AS ccss_ratio, ccvs.vip_type AS ccvs_vip_type, ss.name AS ccss_shop_name, ss.sub_commercial_type_name AS ccss_sub_commercial_type_name, cts.name AS thirdparty_shop_name FROM card_coupon cc LEFT JOIN card_coupon_store_scope ccss ON ccss.coupon_id = cc.id AND ccss.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN card_coupon_vip_scope ccvs ON ccvs.coupon_id = cc.id AND ccvs.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_shop ss ON ss.id = ccss.store_id AND ss.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN card_third_party_shop cts ON cts.id = cc.thirdparty_shop_id AND cts.delete_flag = 0 WHERE cc.id = #{id} AND cc.delete_flag = 0
